meta.description: Calls for Proposals, Tech Conferences, and Speaking Tips
meta.author: Karl L. Hughes

data.name: UXDX
data.description: UXDX brings together UX, Design, Dev and Product to learn how to shift from delivering projects to working as cross-functional teams that build products customers actually want. Come and join us on 8 - 9 October, 2020 in Dublin to learn more.

data.name: General
data.description: Conferences covering a wide range of web development and software engineering topics.

relatedRecords.name: Quest for Quality Conference
relatedRecords.description: Quest for Quality is a 2-day forward thinking annual software QA and testing conference, discussing the latest trends and topics of the quality assurance, bringing together international thought leaders addressing latest challenges of new technologies.

relatedRecords.name: AWS Community Summit - London
relatedRecords.description: Comsum is the Community Summit for AWS. Multi track events with talks and workshops from AWS Community Heroes and Community Members. After the talks networking with 50 classic arcade cabinets, great food and drink.

relatedRecords.name: DDD East Midlands Conference 2020
relatedRecords.location: Nottingham Conference Center, 30 Burton St, Nottingham NG1 4BU
relatedRecords.description: A technology conference for the community, by the community. Celebrates the East Midlands tech community, businesses and talent have to offer through collaboration & innovation.
